text:
(dramatic music)
(engines roaring)
- I really believe that AI

and all generative AI technology
can really help Ferrari
and all our customer experience.
- Generative AI is something

that every company
today needs to consider.
- Working with AWS was really a must.

Because their technology
background is very high.
(exciting music)

One of the big benefit of
having, using Amazon Bedrock
is we have a really big amount of models
that can be used and deployed.

We can test and benchmark
different models,

and we have a simplified single
layer of APIs that are used

to exploit the intelligence
that those models have.

- It's really one of the
game changers that can change

the way we provide access
to the knowledge base.

Particularly, they are able
to untap all the opportunities

of leveraging huge
technical knowledge base

through generative AI to
perform a much faster service

to the customer, and they can
enhance their productivity
and their effectiveness and efficiency
in their day by day operations.

And we are talking about
thousands of users every day

in both our Ferrari
technical assistant team
and in the dealer network.

- We are not only using
AWS Bedrock and the APIs,

also, we are experimenting
a lot with LLMs,
and we are using SageMaker.

In SageMaker we can fine tune
models to our data scientists

and together with Amazon
professional services
to exploit the generative AI solution
by benchmarking all the models
and trying different approaches.
(cheerful upbeat music)
- One of the most interesting use cases

where we are leveraging
generative AI is personalization.

- Generative AI will help us
to give customers and dealers

suggestions to match
the best configuration
for specific customer.
- Thanks to the configurator,
everything was possible within seconds.
So I could try many different colors,

many different interiors,
and made it reality.

- We are also really using
large language models

for enhancing, accelerating
the design process.

For example, we are using
it on computer vision,

both for Formula One,
video competitor analysis,

for anomaly detection in
the manufacturing lines.
So with this huge amount of data today,

through generative AI and
artificial intelligence,

we can make correlations that
were not possible in the past.

Pushing the boundaries
of what experimentation
and product life cycle means for us.
(light music)
